net.proteusframework.users.authentication

Class ProteusRememberMeProcessingFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.acegisecurity.ui.rememberme.RememberMeProcessingFilter
      • net.proteusframework.users.authentication.ProteusRememberMeProcessingFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Filter, Aware, InitializingBean, ApplicationEventPublisherAware

    public class ProteusRememberMeProcessingFilter
extends org.acegisecurity.ui.rememberme.RememberMeProcessingFilter
    Customized version of the normal remember-me processing filter which will apply token authentication even if a principal is authenticated, provided that the authenticated principal's security level is weak enough.
    Author:
    Ken Logan (ken@i2rd.com)
